title: ATTENTION Florida, Texas, Ohio, Georgia, Kentucky, Louisiana, Mississippi, Indiana, Arizona, Arkansas, *Montana, South Carolina, Tennessee, and Hawaii* - THIS YOUR LAST DAY TO REGISTER TO VOTE!
selftext:
**ATTENTION Florida, Texas, Ohio, Georgia, Kentucky, Louisiana, Mississippi,  Indiana, Arizona, Arkansas, Montana,  South Carolina, Tennessee, and Hawaii**

#THIS IS YOUR LAST DAY TO REGISTER TO VOTE!

* *(Hawaii and Montana also offer same day registration - But register now to assure your vote is counted)*

---------------

**These are some of the most important states where the race is very close. Please register now if you haven't already done so. It only takes a couple minutes.**

#[REGISTER HERE](https://www.usa.gov/register-to-vote)

----------------

#The deadline for Nevada, New Mexico, & Illinois is tomorrow

----------------

#The deadline for Missouri is Wednesday 


----------------


#The deadline for New York, North Carolina and Oklahoma is Friday


#Don't Wait --- REGISTER NOW!


------------------

**DEADLINES FOR OTHER STATES: https://i.imgur.com/je7PAiY.png**


---------------------
#EDIT: Arizona registration deadline extended to Oct. 23rd
